text: Nandao ni bu zhidao nage ren ma? Youyu an la ciyu ta wangquan, yin'er ta tong yi bu la xin zhenglun ta de zhu [an la]. Dangshi, yi bu la xin shuo:“Wo de zhu [an la] neng shi sizhe sheng, neng shi sheng zhe si.” Ta [nage ren] shuo:“Wo ye neng shi sizhe sheng, neng shi sheng zhe si.” Yi bu la xin shuo:“An la shi taiyang cong dongfang sheng qi, name, ni shi taiyang cong xifang sheng qi ba!” Jieguo nage bu xinyang zhe chedi bei bian baile. An la jue bu yindao bu yi de minzhong.
